inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: documentation of SS, SC, S beta + thalassemia, S-beta+thalassemia by electrophoresis is required

inclusion.criterion: Taking chronic analgesics (NSAID, acetaminophen) or opioids
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Hemoglobin AA genotype by HPLC or hemoglobin electrophoresis
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: General good health defined as the absence of untreated major medical conditions
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: absence of uncontrolled systemic hypertension, etc.

exclusion.criterion: History of severe vaso-occlusive pain crisis resulting in either evaluation in an emergency department or admission to a hospital during the two weeks prior to study enrollment
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Acute pain at the time of enrollment defined as spontaneous recent onset pain with a self rated score of 6 or higher on a scale of 0-10
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Major medical/psychiatric illness known to cause pain
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of sickle cell crises since childhood and had the same symptoms in past two weeks treated with oxycodone which was not beneficial to his pain.
